GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 03-48N 006-50E AT 210534Z APR.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS
   POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
   PHONE: 603 2031 0014, 603 2078 5763,
   FAX: 603 2078 5769, E-MAIL: IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG,
   PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG AND TO MDAT-GOG,
   PHONE: 332 9822 8888, E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 290808Z APR 18.
